sentences.sContent: Armed with a stouthearted spirit, the little boy was able to knock the giant down.
sentences.sContent_eng: Armed with a stouthearted spirit, the little boy was able to knock the giant down.
sentences.sCn: 小男孩用刚毅的精神鼓舞自己，然后把巨人打倒了。

remMethod.val: stout(勇敢的， 坚决的)+heart(心)+ed → 刚毅的， 大胆的
